languages.text: {n}Паскаль сосредоточенно погружен в начертание священным маслом на металле мехадендритов защитных рун.{/n} "Да охранят предписания сии духов машин, служащих мне, от хулы сквернотехнологий".

{n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль сосредоточенно погружен в начертание священным маслом на металле мехадендритов защитных рун.{/n} "Да охранят предписания сии духов машин, служащих мне, от хулы сквернотехнологий".

traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡正全神贯注地忙着，用神圣机油在机械触须表面绘制着保护性符文。{/n}“愿这些指令能保护那些为我服务的机魂，让它们免受腐化技术的亵渎。”
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡正全神贯注地忙着，用神圣机油在机械触须表面绘制着保护性符文。{/n}“愿这些指令能保护那些为我服务的机魂，让它们免受腐化技术的亵渎。”
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal está completamente concentrado en dibujar runas protectoras con ungüentos sagrados en las superficies metálicas de sus mecadendritas.{/n} «Que estas instrucciones protejan a los espíritus máquina que me sirven contra las blasfemias de la tecnología corrompida».
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal está completamente concentrado en dibujar runas protectoras con ungüentos sagrados en las superficies metálicas de sus mecadendritas.{/n} «Que estas instrucciones protejan a los espíritus máquina que me sirven contra las blasfemias de la tecnología corrompida».
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}パスカルは機械触手の金属的な表面に、聖なる軟膏で保護のルーンを描くことに深く集中している。{/n}「これが、自分に仕える機械精霊を堕落したテクノロジーの冒涜から守ってくれますように」
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは機械触手の金属的な表面に、聖なる軟膏で保護のルーンを描くことに深く集中している。{/n}「これが、自分に仕える機械精霊を堕落したテクノロジーの冒涜から守ってくれますように」
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ist darin vertieft, mit heiligen Balsamen Schutzrunen auf die metallenen Oberflächen seiner Mechadendriten zu malen.{/n} "Mögen diese Anweisungen die Maschinengeister, welche mir dienen, vor der Blasphemie beschädigter Technologie beschützen."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ist darin vertieft, mit heiligen Balsamen Schutzrunen auf die metallenen Oberflächen seiner Mechadendriten zu malen.{/n} "Mögen diese Anweisungen die Maschinengeister, welche mir dienen, vor der Blasphemie beschädigter Technologie beschützen."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.text: {n}Avec une grande concentration, Pasqal trace des runes protectrices à l'aide d'onguents sacrés sur les surfaces en métal de ses mécadendrites.{/n} « Puissent ces instructions éloigner blasphèmes d'une technologie corrompue et en protéger les esprits de la machine qui me servent. »
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

traits.locale_text: {n}Avec une grande concentration, Pasqal trace des runes protectrices à l'aide d'onguents sacrés sur les surfaces en métal de ses mécadendrites.{/n} « Puissent ces instructions éloigner blasphèmes d'une technologie corrompue et en protéger les esprits des machines qui me servent. »
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion

languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, mekadentritlerinin metal yüzeyine kutsal özyağlarla koruyucu rünler çizmeye odaklanmış.{/n} "Bu talimatlar, bana yardımcı olan makine ruhlarını yozlaşmış teknolojilerin kâfirliğinden korusun."
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal is deeply focused on drawing protective runes with sacred unguents on the metal surfaces of his mechadendrites.{/n} "May these instructions protect the machine spirits that serve me from the blasphemies of corrupted technology."

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal tamamen mekadentritlerinin metal yüzeyine kutsal özyağlarla koruyucu rünler çizmeye odaklanmış.{/n} "Bu talimatlar, bana yardımcı olan makine ruhlarını, yozlaşmış kâfir teknolojilerden korusun."
traits.speaker: PascalCompanion
